text: By January 1, 2008, the Mayor shall initiate a public information campaign, including multiple HPV vaccine education forums in each ward, aimed at educating the public on:
historical:

sections.text: The connection between HPV and cervical cancer;
The importance of protecting oneself against HPV infection;
The value of screening for cervical cancer through regular pap tests; and
The effectiveness and risks of the HPV vaccine.

title.text: Human Health Care and Safety. (Refs & Annos)
